P(high-quality | recommended) = P(recommended | high-quality) * P(high-quality) / P(recommended)
= 0.5 * 0.3333 / (0.5 * 0.3333 + 0.5 * 0.6667)
= 0.3333 / (0.16665 + 0.33335)
= 0.3333 / 0.5
= 0.6667

So, the probability of the product being high-quality given that I'm recommending it is approximately 66.67%.
